alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 3:33AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Through 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible into the Sierra and across Westgard Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for downed trees and powerlines as well.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
